content:
What is the safest sequence of body movements to follow for a workout routine given the table below? Use the corresponding numbers for each body movement and ensure that the sequence follows proper exercise science and anatomy principles.
Exercise # | Body Movement
-----------|----------------
1          | 5
2          | 4
3          | 1
4          | 2
5          | 6
6          | 3
Please provide your solution in JavaScript code format.
